wikipedia_page.main: John R. Barbour (1 September 1890 – 15 July 1916) was a Scottish professional footballer who played as an inside right in the Scottish and English leagues for Queen's Park, Dundee and Preston North End.

response: * John Barbour (MP for New Shoreham), MP for New Shoreham 1368-1382
